name: Umami Finance
tagline: Umami: Home of Real Yield on Arbitrum
description: Umami Finance is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) where holders vote to decide the future of the project. $UMAMI is the lifeblood of the Umami ecosystem, giving holders a direct claim on the fee revenue our products such as our upcoming flagship Delta Minimized GLP Vaults.

name: Buffer Finance
description: Buffer Finance is a non-custodial, exotic options trading platform built to trade short-term price volatility and hedge risk of high-leverage positions.

name: Relay Chain
tagline: The Ultimate Gateway to Cross-Chain Trading
description: RelayChain is a dApp that optimizes cross-chain token transfers and swaps by aggregating bridge liquidity between the worldâ€™s leading blockchains. We aggregate from multiple bridges and DEXs to ensure the best cross-chain experience, and lowest cost, for users.

name: GMX
description: GMX is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange that supports low swap fees and zero price impact trades. Trading is supported by a unique multi-asset pool that earns liquidity providers fees from market making, swap fees and leverage trading. Dynamic pricing is supported by Chainlink Oracles and an aggregate of prices from leading volume exchanges.

name: Jones DAO
description: Jones DAO is a yield strategy and liquidity protocol with vaults that enable 1-click access to top quality strategies. These strategies unlock liquidity and capital efficiency for DeFi through yield-bearing tokens.

name: LEXER Markets
description:
LEXER is a Decentralized Perpetual Exchange for Crypto, Forex, NFT & more. 
LEXER is powered by its unprecedented and innovative Hybrid Liquidity Engine and Smart Router on top of an evolving group of Oracle-based Settlement Algorithms, providing best on-chain trading experience and supporting a wide range of markets with liquidity infrastructure.

name: Liquity Protocol
description: Interest-free LUSD borrowing on Ethereum, 100% ETH-backed, powered by immutable contracts and maximizing for resilience.

name: Pendle
description: The Pendle protocol enables permissionless tokenization and trading of yield. Pendle allows anyone to purchase assets at a discount, obtain fixed yield, or long DeFi yield.

name: Silo Finance
tagline: Permissionless and risk-isolated lending markets for all crypto assets
description:
Silo Finance is a non-custodial lending protocol that creates permissionless and risk-isolated lending markets for all crypto assets, so you can borrow any token using another securely.
Silo on Arbitrum uses an isolated-pool approach where every token asset has its own lending market and is paired against the bridge assets ETH and USDC. Lenders in all protocols are only exposed to the risk of ETH and USDC at any given time. Since all tokens are paired with ETH or USDC, there is only a single market for every token asset, preventing fractured liquidity and allowing greater protocol efficiency.

name: Vela Exchange
tagline: The New Era of DEXs, starting with perpetual trading.
description: Vela Exchange is a permissionless, self-custody driven perpetual exchange built with innovative blockchain architecture to ensure fast transactions, secure trading, and extensibility into additional synthetic options and derivatives.

name: WINR Protocol
description:
The WINR Protocol pioneers the transition of iGaming to web3
 by providing smart contract tools, a liquidity engine,
 and an incentive framework to builders.

name: Redacted
tagline: Empowering on-chain liquidity, governance, and cash flow for DeFi protocols
description: Redacted Protocol is a hub for BTRFLY users to engage in governance and earn revenue from Redacted treasury and product suite.

name: Dsquared.finance
description: Delivering consistent, risk-adjusted returns across market cycles through highly-secure vaults

name: Spool
tagline: Spool. Your Gateway to Institutional-Grade DeFi.
description: Spool is permissionless middleware that allows users and builders to access DeFi in a fully composable manner. It lays the foundation for a customizable, scalable, and efficient financial services ecosystem that bridges the gap between end users and DeFi primitives.

name: Thales
tagline: Liquidity and AMM solution for Exclusive Outcome markets.
description: Thales Protocol offers an on-chain liquidity and automated market making solution for mutually exclusive events that can have binary or ternary exclusive outcomes with unprecedented capital efficiency due to our risk-based AMM architecture and minimization of toxic flow risk. Key product market fit built on top of this architecture are on-chain Sports Markets and Digital Options derivatives.

name: PlutusDAO
description: PlutusDAO is Arbitrums premier governance aggregator where users can get the benefit of receiving maximum rewards with maximum liquidity across an array of veASSETs through the use of plsASSETs.

name: Abracadabra
description: Abracadabra is a lending platform that uses interest-bearing tokens (such as magicGLP) as collateral to borrow a USD pegged stablecoin (Magic Internet Money - MIM), that can be used as any other traditional stablecoin. Thanks to Abracadabra built in leverage engine, users can leverage up on the yield produced by their favourite interest bearing collaterals.

name: Sperax
tagline: Sperax: Stablecoin and yield automator on Arbitrum
description: Sperax USD protocol mints USDs, a 100% collateralized stablecoin. USDs is fully on-chain, backed by on-chain collateral, and generates organic yield for their holders. SPA is the governance token of Sperax and a revenue-sharing partner of USDs. SPA can be staked to gain governance power in Sperax DAO. A SPA staker gets vote-escrowed SPA (veSPA) for staking SPA. Demeter protocol is an audited and permissionless farm launcher on UniswapV3 and Camelot. USDs and SPA trading pairs on Demeter can be added to Gauge, a reward mechanism that emits SPA based on the vote ratio of veSPA holders
